Execution of suspicious commands or Powe.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 logs for process creations containing command-line arguments like 'gpresult', 'Get-DomainGPO', 'Get-DomainGPOLocalGroup'. Calculate the entropy of command-line strings or process names relative to baselines to identify anomalous execution.

Abnormal volume or pattern of LDAP queri.Action: Analyze Zeek dcerpc.log (or relevant logs) and Windows Event ID 4661 logs for LDAP queries targeting 'groupPolicyContainer' objects. Calculate the frequency and volume of such queries per source IP/user/timeframe. Use time series analysis or statistical profiling to identify spikes or unusual patterns compared to normal domain activity.
